summary: V2 Released! Better Performance! Better Looks!
descriptionHtml:
This ENB is for those who want a Summer/Spring or happy looking Skyrim, but still keeps a cold/cool feeling while still having performance good enough for normal gameplay. Some of my Frames are low (less than 45FPS) because of the post processing effects being out on my 4K textures and intense grass (as well as some ini edits for long distance rendering).
[b]********************************************************************************************************************************************************[/b]
[center][b][u][color=#ff7700][size=4]Divine ENB V2 is out!
[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[b][u][color=#00ff00][size=3]This Version changes:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
The Brightness indoors

The DoF has more options

Better Saturation/Colors

More FPS Efficiency [/center][b]********************************************************************************************************************************************************[/b]
[color=#00ff00][size=4][b][u]MY Performance and Specs:
[/u][/b][/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Specs:[/color]
GTX 770 2GB VRAM
i7 2600k @ 3.4 Ghz
9GB of RAM @ 1600Mhz (yes it is possible to have 9 gigs of RAM, not just even numbers)

[color=#00ffff]Performance:[/color]
Exteriors~45-55FPS (37-49 in grassy or heavily dense foliage areas/huge open areas with tons of textures and stuff to render)
Interiors~60FPS

[b][u][color=#ffff00]BTW: I have my iMinGrassSize set to 20 so I have VERY DENSE GRASS[/color][/u][/b]
[b]********************************************************************************************************************************************************[/b]

[size=4][b][u][color=#6fa8dc]REQUIRED MODS:[/color]
[/u][/b][/size][size=3][u][b]
[color=#00ffff]Option 1:[/color][/b][/u][color=#00ffff]
[/color][b][u][color=#00ffff]Climates of Tamriel and Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/color]
[/u][/b][/size]
[b][u][color=#000000][size=3]Option 2:
Pure Weather and ELFX (enhancer+exteriors are optional)[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[b]********************************************************************************************************************************************************[/b]
[b][u][size=5]TO INSTALL[/size][/u][/b]

[color=#e69138]1. Download ENB Series [/color][url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0264.html]v264 or above at ENBDEV[/url][color=#e69138], (the download button is on the bottom).[/color]

[color=#e69138]2. Extract [/color][b]ONLY the d3d9.dll and the enbhost.exe [/b][color=#e69138]from the [/color][b]wrapper version [/b][color=#e69138]to your Skyrim directory, (by default at C:Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim).[/color]

[color=#e69138]3. Place enb Files into the Skyrim directory[/color]

[color=#ff00ff][size=3][b][u]This Does not apply for Version 2: [/u][/b][/size][/color][color=#e69138]4(for option 2).If you have DLC(DAWNGUARD,DRAGONBORN,AND HEARTHFIRE) then place files from "If you Have DLC" into skyrim data folder, if you do not have DLC then place files from "If you Don't Have DLC" into skyrim data folder. [/color]

[color=#e69138]5. Add (or modify) these lines to your [/color][b]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/b][color=#e69138] file (located by default in C:/Users/xxxxxxx/Documents/My Games/Skyrim)[/color]
[color=#e69138]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/color]
[color=#e69138]bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/color]
[color=#e69138]bDrawLandShadows=1[/color]
[color=#e69138]bShadowsOnGrass=1[/color]

[color=#e69138]6. Open your Skyrim Launcher (NOT SKSE) and diasable ALL Anti-Aliasing and Anisotropic Filtering[/color]

[color=#e69138]7. Set your enblocal.ini file for these two lines- [/color][url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENB#tab=Installation]For a tutorial Go here[/url][color=#e69138]:[/color]
[color=#e69138]ReservedMemorySizeMb=xxx[/color]
[color=#e69138]VideoMemorySizeMb=xxxx[/color]

[b][u][size=5]TO UNINSTALL[/size][/u][/b]
[color=#e69138]Delete all files you added from the enb(including the ELE files)[/color]
[b]********************************************************************************************************************************************************
[u][size=4]Recommended Mods(The mods I use)[/size][/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57968/?]Extreme Grass[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49661/?]4K Parallax and Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D50065&pUp=1]CM_Bark (in optional files section)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49011/?]Quality Snow 4K[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22608/?]Towns and Villages Enhanced-Windelm[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21148/?]
Towns and Villages Enhanced-Solitude[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56639/?]JK's Whiterun[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57591/?]JK's Windhelm[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48227/?]HD Detailed Terrain[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34886/?]Lorkhan's Vision[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40564/?]Skyfalls+Skymills - Animated Distant Waterfalls and WindMills[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48290/?]Skyfix - Unique Inn Signs HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28642/?]Ultimate HD Fire Effects[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930/?]Revamped Exterior Fog[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?]Wet And Cold[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27022/?]Supreme Storms[/url]
author: TheDrDocter
